title: Terms and Conditions
text:
I. General Provisions

1.1. These terms and conditions govern the relationship between the online store CapyCanna and the end consumer (hereinafter referred to as the "Buyer").

1.2. The store is operated by Three Whales s.r.o., located at Lidická 700/19, Veveří, 602 00 Brno, IČO: 19925468.

1.3. Contact email for inquiries: help@capycanna.com.

1.4. The website is intended exclusively for buyers aged 18 and above. To access the site, users must confirm their age by clicking the appropriate button.

1.5. All transactions are governed by Czech law, including the Civil Code No. 89/2012 and the Consumer Protection Act No. 634/1992.

1.6. Three Whales s.r.o. operates the online store at www.capycanna.com (hereinafter referred to as the "Online Store"), offering verified and professionally manufactured hemp products.

1.7. Contractual relationships between Three Whales s.r.o. and the Buyer are governed by these terms and applicable legal provisions, particularly the Civil Code No. 89/2012.

II. Conclusion of the Purchase Agreement

2.1. Orders in the CapyCanna online store are placed through the online form on the website.

2.2. The order process consists of three steps:

  • Cart: Buyers can add or remove products, use promo codes, gift certificates, or bonuses.
  • Personal Data: Buyers provide delivery information (name, surname, email, phone number, address). Additional details, such as company information or an alternative delivery address, may also be provided.
  • Payment and Delivery: Buyers choose a delivery method (courier or post office) and a payment method (Google Pay, bank transfer, or card payment).

2.3. After completing the order process, the Buyer receives confirmation via email.

2.4. Before the order is submitted, the Buyer can review and modify the details provided.

2.5. The purchase agreement is considered concluded upon the Buyer receiving confirmation from Three Whales s.r.o..

2.6. Communication costs related to concluding the purchase agreement are borne by the Buyer and do not exceed standard rates.

2.7. Ordered goods will be delivered within 30 days of the agreement’s conclusion. If the goods are unavailable within this timeframe, Three Whales s.r.o. reserves the right to withdraw from the agreement.

2.8. Pursuant to the Sales Registration Act, Three Whales s.r.o. is obligated to issue the Buyer a receipt and register the sale with the tax administrator.

2.9. Listed prices include taxes (e.g., VAT) but do not include delivery and packaging costs.

2.10. The Buyer is obligated to accept the goods. If the goods are not accepted, Three Whales s.r.o. reserves the right to cancel the agreement, and the Buyer is responsible for covering all delivery-related expenses.

2.11. Hemp products (CBD) are provided solely for laboratory, educational, or collection purposes.

2.12. The purchase agreement may be concluded in Czech, Slovak, or English.

III. User Account

3.1. After registering, the Buyer gains access to a personal interface ("User Account") on the website.

3.2. The Buyer agrees to provide accurate and up-to-date information in their account and to update it as necessary.

3.3. Access to the account is secured by a login and password, which the Buyer is obligated to keep confidential.

3.4. The User Account may be temporarily unavailable due to technical maintenance. Three Whales s.r.o. is not liable for damages caused by account unavailability.

3.5. Three Whales s.r.o. reserves the right to delete a User Account if the Buyer violates the terms or infringes upon third-party rights, with prior notice.

IV. Delivery and Deadlines

4.1. Delivery costs depend on the carrier.

4.2. Free delivery is available for orders over €100.

4.3. Delivery times depend on the carrier.

4.4. Three Whales s.r.o. is not responsible for delays caused by the courier service.

V. Returns and Order Cancellation

5.1. If you use the service as a consumer, your rights are governed by Czech law. These provisions apply only if you act as a consumer outside the scope of business activity.

5.2. Under the Czech Civil Code, the consumer has the right to withdraw from the agreement within 14 days of its conclusion without providing any reason.

5.3. This right also applies within 14 days of receiving the goods, regardless of the delivery or payment method.

5.4. Upon withdrawal, Three Whales s.r.o. is obligated to refund the paid amount, including delivery costs, using the same payment method within 14 days. The Buyer must return the goods in full, in their original packaging, and without signs of use or damage. All return shipping costs are borne by the Buyer.

5.5. If the returned goods are damaged due to the Buyer’s fault, Three Whales s.r.o. reserves the right to deduct compensation for the reduced value of the goods.

5.6. Disputes between the Buyer and Seller may be resolved out of court through the Czech Trade Inspection Authority (Štěpánská 15, 120 00 Praha 2, email: adr@coi.cz) or the online dispute resolution platform (ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr/).

5.7. Exceptions to the right of return include goods with compromised original packaging, rendering further use impractical (e.g., opened oils).

5.8. Order cancellation is possible until the order is handed over to the courier service. For cancellation, the Buyer may contact the Seller via email or use their User Account.

VI. Personal Data and Usage

6.1. During registration or order placement, the following personal data are processed: name, surname, email, phone number, delivery address (street, house number, city, ZIP code, optional apartment number).

6.2. For company orders, additional data are processed: company name, CIN, VAT number.

6.3. Data are used for:

  • Identifying contractual parties.
  • Communicating with the Buyer and fulfilling obligations.
  • Sending marketing messages unless the Buyer opts out.

6.4. Data processing is based on Articles 6(1)(b) and 6(1)(e) GDPR and lasts for the duration of the contract and 10 years afterward (or longer if required by law).

6.5. The Buyer’s email may be included in marketing communications under Act No. 480/2004 on Information Society Services. The Buyer may unsubscribe at any time.

6.6. Data are not shared with third parties except for:

  • Courier services (for delivery).
  • Payment systems (for processing payments).
  • Review services (for feedback collection).

6.7. Under GDPR, the Buyer has the right to:

  • Request information about their data.
  • Update or correct data.
  • Restrict processing or request data deletion (unless required by law).
  • File complaints with the Data Protection Authority.

VII. Defective Goods and Warranty

7.1. If the purchased goods are defective, the Buyer must notify Three Whales s.r.o. via email.

7.2. Detailed procedures for complaint handling are specified in the Complaint Policy.

7.3. The Buyer is entitled to a refund or replacement for defects not caused by their actions.

VIII. Final Provisions

8.1. These terms are governed by Czech law. Disputes will be resolved in Czech courts.

8.2. Three Whales s.r.o. reserves the right to amend the terms. Buyers will be notified of changes via email.

8.3. If any provision becomes invalid, the remaining terms remain enforceable.

8.4. These terms are effective from January 1, 2025.

IX. Disclaimer

For disclaimers, refer to the Disclaimer section.
